title: Cherry Pop
description: Cherry is on the prowl again. Finding the right person to ramp up her nights shouldn't be too hard. Cherry's misadventures are steamy, hot and in your face. Nothing will stop her from getting exactly what she wants, when she wants it. Finding the perfect guy to keep her satisfied should be nothing short of fun and easy, but who will be ultimately seduced in the end?This collection includes parts 1-3 of Chasing Cherries (A Sexy Romp) Chasing CherriesChasing The TeaseChasing Play
author: Roxie Elms
